messages.message: 9: XMR (4-hours, daily), ATOM (12-hours, daily), PEPE (12-hours, daily), SAND (12-hours), ALGO (12 hours, daily), MANA (daily), SFP (12 hours, daily), WAVES (daily) + stop loss
8: APE (daily), EOS (6-hours, 12-hours), NEAR (daily), ETC (6-hours, 12-hours) + stop loss
